languages.text: [Обратиться к беженцу] "Ты бросаешься серьезными обвинениями, человек. Надеюсь, тебе есть, чем их подтвердить".
[Address the refugee] "Those are serious accusations you're spouting. I hope you have proof to back them up."
languages.original_text: [Обратиться к беженцу] "Ты бросаешься серьезными обвинениями, человек. Надеюсь, тебе есть, чем их подтвердить".

traits.locale_text: [Address the refugee] "Those are serious accusations you're spouting. I hope you have something to support them with."
[Address the refugee] "Those are serious accusations you're spouting. I hope you have something to support them with."
[Address the refugee] "Those are serious accusations you're spouting. I hope you have proof to back them up."
[Address the refugee] "Those are serious accusations you're spouting. I hope you have proof to back them up."
[Address the refugee] "Those are serious accusations you're spouting. I hope you have proof to back them up."

languages.text: [難民に話しかける]「そこまで非難するからには、裏付ける証拠とやらを持っているのか？」
languages.original_text: [Address the refugee] "Those are serious accusations you're spouting. I hope you have proof to back them up."

traits.locale_text: [難民に話しかける]「そこまで非難するからには、裏付ける証拠とやらを持っているのか？」

languages.text: [对难民开口]“你说的这些话是非常严重的指控，我希望你有证据支持你的言论。”
languages.original_text: [Address the refugee] "Those are serious accusations you're spouting. I hope you have proof to back them up."

traits.locale_text: [对难民开口]“你说的这些话是非常严重的指控，我希望你有证据支持你的言论。”

languages.text: [Dirigirte al refugiado] «Estás lanzando acusaciones muy graves. Espero que tengas pruebas que las respalden».
languages.original_text: [Address the refugee] "Those are serious accusations you're spouting. I hope you have proof to back them up."

traits.locale_text: [Dirigirte al refugiado] «Estás lanzando acusaciones muy graves. Espero que tengas pruebas que las respalden».

languages.text: [Vous adresser au réfugié] « Ce sont des accusations graves que vous portez là. J'espère que vous avez des preuves pour les étayer. »
languages.original_text: [Address the refugee] "Those are serious accusations you're spouting. I hope you have proof to back them up."

traits.locale_text: [Vous adresser au réfugié] « Ce sont des accusations graves que vous portez là. J'espère que vous avez des preuves pour les étayer. »

languages.text: [Den Flüchtling ansprechen] "Das sind ernsthafte Anschuldigungen, die Ihr da äußert. Hoffentlich könnt Ihr sie auch durch Beweise belegen."
languages.original_text: [Address the refugee] "Those are serious accusations you're spouting. I hope you have proof to back them up."

traits.locale_text: [Den Flüchtling ansprechen] "Das sind ernsthafte Anschuldigungen, die Ihr da äußert. Hoffentlich könnt Ihr sie auch durch Beweise belegen."

languages.text: [Mülteciye hitap et] "Ciddi suçlamalarda bulunuyorsun. Umarım iddialarını destekleyecek kanıtın vardır."
languages.original_text: [Address the refugee] "Those are serious accusations you're spouting. I hope you have proof to back them up."

traits.locale_text: [Sığınmacıya hitap et] "Ciddi suçlamalarda bulunuyorsun. Umarım bu iddiaları destekleyecek kanıtların vardır."
